Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

McGowan stares. She was sick of waiting.

McGowan: 8 9 10!

McGowan punches=
 Brown in the jaw and throws him to the ground so Chop Shop and Shrapnel ca=
n start their feast. Brown didn't move though. Since no one was bothering t=
o help him, he decided to accept his death even though he horrified of deat=
h, especially by being eaten.

Virgo: Uh...

Virgo looks at Depp's kitana. =
She stares at the long slightly curved blade, sticking to the side and up a=
 little. She smiles.

Virgo: Make her run and throw herself onto the blade!=


Virgo points to the kitana.

Lee fires 2 fireballs towards the chivtron b=
ase. Barrymore fires at the chivtron base 5 times. Birdbot's grenades click=
 and both explode. The fiery blaze rockets towards the chivtron base. Paper=
tron fires 2 missiles towards the chivtron base.

Papertron: FER!...

McGow=
an: Hear this Shitrons! Whip out the barbeque sauce! Because you Shitrons h=
ave never been deader!...

McGowan turns to watch Chop Shop and Shrapnel fe=
ast on Brown as well as to see Periwinkle perform her trick after being giv=
en the command...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Narrator 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 17, 2002 3:09 AM
  Subject:=
 Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


  Bombshell: What next?

=
  Chop Shop transform to beats mode, so does Shrapnel. The autoguns shoot S=
hrapnel right in the ass and make him run forward...

    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: =
Sunday, February 17, 2002 12:34 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you di=
g it, Chivtrons?...


    OOC: Airly, you better reply to those shots soon.=
 I don't care if you don't want to lose, I'm sick of your moding!!

    IC:=


    Periwinkle stares and starts crapping. A large pile of crap now sits =
on the ground. She turns, dropping to her knees. She buries her face in the=
 pile and starts eating away.

    McGowan: Hear this you shit eaters! Get =
out here and fight!

    Virgo was in a laughing spell, pointing to Periwin=
kle. The others, too, could not help but laugh.

    McGowan: And, now! You=
 will come out by the time I count to 10, or Brown will be ingested and dig=
ested!...1....2....3....4....5.....6.....7......

      ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
      From: Narrator 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Se=
nt: Saturday, February 16, 2002 8:03 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can=
 you dig it, Chivtrons?...


      Bombshell: Of course!

      He sends a =
signal to the cerebro shell in Periwinkle's head, it tells her to crap and =
eat it.

      Bombshell: Nobody has as much fun as me...

        ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
        Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
        Subject: R=
e: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


        McGowan: Hmm...You =
got a point there....He is shit....Well, think it over and let me know.

  =
      Brown was quite relieved that nothing happened yet. McGowan then whis=
pered to him.

        McGowan: Don't be so relaxed....Any chivtron in my h=
ands is sure to die....

        Periwinkle dances around like a fool. She =
does the mambo and also dances like Rikishi Phatu.

        Virgo and the o=
thers laugh.

        Virgo: Make her eat her own crap!...

          -----=
 Original Message ----- 
          From: Narrator 
          To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 5:11 AM
         =
 Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


          Chop S=
hop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I don't know, it'd be pre=
tty cool, actually.

          Barrage was hit by a shot from the base. He =
totally ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shields. He was hit by an=
other shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ransack holds his hand o=
ut and a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a button as it lands in =
his hand, and then throws it at the base. It's set to explode when the time=
r ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base and gasps.

          =
Bombshell: Hee hee hee! What should I make her do? Dance!

          He sen=
ds out a signal to the shell in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

   =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: *Orchid* 
        =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, February 16, 20=
02 3:51 AM
            Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?=
...


            OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, =
reply to my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything seems t=
o go on very casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it=
 is McGowan's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

       =
     IC:

            Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into space aft=
er the cerebro shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombshell's slav=
e...

            McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot=
 and Papertron are struck by the several shots but hold their ground. On th=
e other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore with a si=
dejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She remembered =
that although Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

            McGowan: I =
hope you Shitrons know that there is going to be another death over here! Y=
our precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

            Depp passes Br=
own to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fir=
e off 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Bird=
bot fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, w=
atching all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turn=
s to the Insecticons.

            McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't come ou=
t soon, would you mind eating this guy?

            Brown eyes widened and=
 hoped that the Insecticons would do something less brutal...

            =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Airshadow Nightlight 
 =
             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, Febr=
uary 16, 2002 1:50 AM
              Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig i=
t, Chivtrons?...


              OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll pos=
t with Aerotaur. 

              Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

        =
      "Stop little one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and left h=
er in Nightlight's arms. 

              "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"=
said Trinity. 

              "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the b=
ase's defences. 

              The external defences turned on and fired a=
gainst the Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
